string.description.discord.command.giverole: Gives the specified role to the user.
string.discord.command.giverole.success.embedbo: The user, **${user}**, has been given the role ${}
string.discord.command.giverole.error.unspecifi: The user that you provided was invalid! Please specify a valid user/ID.
string.discord.command.giverole.error.problemoc: An error occurred when using this command.
string.discord.command.giverole.error.ratelimit: You're currently on cooldown! You have **${seconds}** left before you can use another command.
string.discord.command.giverole.error.alreadyun: That user has either already been unbanned, or hasn't been banned whatsoever!
string.discord.command.giverole.error.botmissin: I am missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please turn that on so I can unban said person.
string.discord.command.giverole.error.usermissi: You are missing the `BAN_PERMISSION` permission. Please have the required permission so you can unban that person.
